GMCH Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 05 Staff Nurse Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 13, 2025, 15:45 IST
 Government Medical College and Hospital
 5 Jobs |  Posted On : 13-Aug-2025 |  Maharashtra |  Salary : 21,000 to 25,000




FOLLOW

The Government Medical College Hospital Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar (GMCH Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 05 Blood Bank Counsellor, Lab Technician, and Staff Nurse Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last dates of application. Candidates who have completed their Post-graduation, DMLT, B.Sc Nursing, GNM, and 12th  can apply for the GMCH Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar Recruitment 2025. Interested and eligible candidates can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Maharashtra.

GMCH Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Blood Bank Counsellor	02	Post-graduation
Lab Technician	02	DMLT, 12th
Staff Nurse	01	GNM, B.Sc Nursing

GMCH Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 18 Years.
The maximum age limit: 60 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

GMCH Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

GMCH Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

GMCH Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 21,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 25,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the GMCH Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the GMCH Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form. 
Submit the filled application form to the mentioned address.
Take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Address:

The office of the Professor and Head of Department, Department of Pathology, Govt. Medical College, Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar, pin-431001.

Important Dates:

Starting date	31-07-2025
Closing date	18-08-2025

 

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
